1.content:
(originally done by Rdolan1272)

         Wonder Woman sat at the apartment's small, round dining room table and stared out the window, her hulking frame dwarfing the chair in which she sat while her hardened blue eyes stared blankly out into space. A frown creased the natural beauty of her Amazonian features, an expression so deeply engrained into her face that it might as well have been carved in stone. She'd held the pose for some time—long enough for her coffee to run cold and her host to become concerned.

         "Diana?" Zatanna asked quietly, not wanting to spook the Amazon princess because in the magician's experience, spooking Amazons, princess or otherwise, usually ended up in massive property damage. In fact, they'd just finished cleaning up some Amazon fueled property damage a few hours earlier. A small group of Amazonian dissenters had attacked downtown San Francisco because—well, neither Diana nor Zatanna had figured out why. They weren't even sure how much Queen Hippolyta knew about the attack. Or if she had possibly ordered it. The government forces that'd arrived to fight the Amazons were convinced that Hippolyta was behind the attack, and they were chomping at the bit to launch a counterstrike, especially one Amanda Waller. The resulting shouting match between Waller and Wonder Woman had grown so tense that Zatanna was afraid her friend might punch Waller across a few state lines. Afterward, and thankfully without any punching, Zatanna had asked her fellow Justice Leaguer to come back to Zatanna's apartment and chill, an offer Wonder Woman quickly accepted. "Diana?"

         Wonder Woman, Diana to her friends, pulled her focus from the light morning sky and blinked at Zatanna as if noticing her for the first time. "What?"

         "Where'd you go just now?" Zatanna asked, her concern building. "You started to tell me what was bugging you, then you just zoned out. Is everything all right?"

         "Yeah, I'm fine," Diana said. She cupped her mug and tried not to frown at its lack of warmth, but Zatanna noticed.

         She reached over and took the cup from Diana. "You're a terrible liar," she said as she went to pour out the cold coffee and refill the mug. She came back and placed it down in front of Diana, who smiled in appreciation. "I think you want to talk about it. That's why you came over here. So talk."

         Diana took a sip before saying anything, using the time to arrange her thoughts. "I guess…I'm just tired," she said at last.

         "Tired? Tired how?"

         The big Amazon fidgeted, turning her mug in her large hands and studying the coffee intently. "Just tired. I mean, today it's my Amazon sisters attacking. Last week it was a White Martian invasion. Week before that was Giganta and Cheetah and Circe and Ares. And then there's the constant fighting with mother, who still cannot accept my choice to protect the world beyond Themyscira's borders."

         "Sounds like you've been busy."

         "Yeah," Diana agreed, her shoulders slumping, "that's one way of putting it."

         "Why not take some time off? Go on vacation. Somewhere quiet and relaxing."

         Diana made a face. "Sure, a vacation would be great, but people like us don't get vacations. Last time I tried, I spent the week freeing an island from Egg Fu. Egg Fu!"

         "Okay," Zatanna agreed, "you've got a point." She frowned into her own coffee. This was far from normal behavior from Diana, the stress was starting to mount on the princess, and Zatanna hated to see her friend so upset.

         For a while the two warriors sat in silence, one feeling guilty for admitting to what she perceived to be weakness, the other feeling guilty that she wasn't being much help. Until a thought struck Zatanna. "What if there was a way you could take some time off, catch some R and R, without getting dragged into any fights."

         Diana shook her head and laughed, a bit too bitterly for Zatanna's peace of mind. "If that were possible, it'd be nice. But I don't think even you and your mystic powers can make that wish come true."

         "Do you trust me?" Zatanna asked, a smile on her lips.

         "You're serious?"

         "Yeah."

         "What if…what if I'm needed? I can't just…"

         Zatanna reached out and placed a friendly hand on Diana's. "There're hundreds of heroes on Earth that can handle the Egg Fu's for a few days." Diana started to protest, but Zatanna cut her short. "Look, if they need you, we'll have you back up and ready to save us all in no time, but you need a break. Everyone needs some time to recharge. To reenergize. So, what do you say? A little vacation time on me?"

         "And if I'm needed…?"

         "All I'll have to do is say the word."

         Diana looked at her friend, reluctant to just up and abandon her post as protector, but on the other hand, Zatanna had a point. Everyone needed a break every now and then, even a princess of Themyscira. "Okay, fine," she relented. "Where're you sending me?"

         With a sweeping motion fit for a stage magician, Zatanna stood and spread her arms out to the room around her. "You're already there, princess."

         "Huh?"

         "Here. If you agree, you can have a vacation here. Carefree and relaxed. You can let someone take care of you for a change." Zatanna took a theatrical bow. "If you'll allow me. If you trust me. Just say the word."

         Diana folded her arms across her chest and looked around the apartment, amusement showing on her face. "Of course I trust you, Zatanna. But what do you have in mind."

         "I know you. I know how you worry. And how well you can't not worry. So I want to take your worries away. I want you to have some fun. Let your biggest concerns be when you're eating and going to sleep."

         "You want me to just sit around here eating and sleeping?"

         Zatanna moved her hands in a flourish and produced a small bundle of flowers from seemingly nowhere. "And having fun."

         Diana shook her head and chuckled at her friend's antics. "Okay then. Do whatever it is you're going to do."

         The magician sat back down and focused on Diana's eyes. "If at any time you want to end this, just say, 'Return to normal.' You'll be able to say that phrase, no matter what."

         Diana wasn't sure what that meant, nor was she sure she liked what that might mean, but before she could raise any questions, Zatanna's hands were moving, and a pink aura spilled off the magician as she said, "ssergeR rednoW namoW dnoyeb reh serac dna snrecnoc."


What age does Wonder Woman gets regress to?

"Whats wrong Diana?" asked Zatanna lifting up the toddler then the smell hit her. So she got her to the change table but as she was about to conjure up a few more training, Diana complain that she was suppose to be a big girl that don't pee and poop herself.

         "Well Diana, part of this vacation you are not suppose to have a worrie or care. Do you want to try to be potty train or get younger?" Asked Zatanna. Diana thought about it then says

13.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)          

         The aura moved outward from Zatanna to encircle Diana. It was warm and soothing as it caressed her skin. She closed her eyes and let it hug her, breathing it in with tranquility. She barely felt the changes. Her tight, sculpted muscles softened and receded. Her face, always a perfect balance of beauty and ferocity, grew soft with youth and innocence. Her long, lean arms and legs pulled backward as her torso shortened. Her large, firm breasts deflated slowly and her curvy hips narrowed and straightened as her body traveled backward through the aging process. The upper part of her costume changed from spandex and armor into a small, loose t-shirt with her logo on the chest, and her star-spangled panties fluffed out slightly and turned into a pair of star-spangled pull-ups.

         When the physical regression stopped, Diana looked to be around three years old. She looked over her narrow, scrawny body and even felt around with her hands in disbelief. Then she looked up at Zatanna in question, only to find the sorceress smiling down at her.

         "Well," Zatanna asked, her hands still poised, "what do you think?"

         "I'm little," Diana said, and jumped at how high and tiny her voice was.

         "Yes, you are. If you'd rather grow back up…"

         Diana thought about this a second. Her childhood back on Paradise Island was anything but conventional, and it didn't take her long to decide this could be fun. "No."

         "With your permission, I'll let the spell finish out."

         "Yeah," Diana said, still amused at her voice.

         Zatanna let go the remainder of the spell, and Diana's mind started feeling fuzzy, as though a cloud were falling over it and covering her thoughts. Her memories slowly receded—thoughts of conflicts and stressors and favorite foods and annoying ex-boyfriends all melted from her consciousness, covered by the fog of the spell—and even her adult experiences faded under the power of the spell.

         When it was done and her childish mind was in place, she looked up to the tall woman dressed like a stage magician and smiled. "Tanna," she asked, her voice dripping with innocence, "what we doing?"

         Zatanna smiled and bent down to bink the diminutive Diana on the nose. "We're going to have some fun, Diana. Just you and me. That sound good?"

         "Yeah!"
13.title: 3 years old

131.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         Zatanna had magiced up a whole bunch of toys, everything from dolls in dresses and stuffed animals to big bouncy balls and action figures (none, of course, with small, swallow-able pieces). Diana took one look at the frilly dressed dolls and ignored them, focusing instead on the action figures—mainly the female ones—and the stuffed animals, which she used as large, plush antagonists for her 'heroes' to fight against.

         "Roar!" she said as she moved a big teddy bear into place to menace her chosen action figures. "Grrr! Rawr!"

         "Oh, no," Zatanna said, manipulating some of the figures chosen for her by Diana. "It's Teddy the Terrible! What're we gonna do?"

         At Zatanna's announcement, many of the less female figures under Diana's care fell back in fear of the dreaded plushy, but the female figures being controlled by Diana and Zatanna stepped forward bravely. "Don't worry, boys," Diana said by way of a warrior looking figure that resembled Xena, "we'll protect you. Isn't that right, Tanna?"

         Zatanna marched one of her lady figures up next to Diana's and said in as silly a heroic voice as she could muster, "That's right, Diana! This Teddy picked the wrong place to have a picnic."

         This caused Diana to giggle, but once she got herself under control, the fight was on. And a fierce fight it was. Teddy the Terrible 'Grrrrr-ed' and 'Rawr-ed' and otherwise stomped around, and occasionally on, the heroic defenders. He swung his fluffy paws and kicked his fluffy feet, giving Diana and Zatanna's heroes all they could handle. Meanwhile the boy figures mostly cowered in fear and sometimes needed to be saved, a task Diana seemed to take great pleasure in performing. Let it not be said she was not an Amazon through and through.

         In the end only the two favorite characters remained standing, determined to save their fallen comrades from the vile clutches of Teddy. And just when it seemed the bleakest, just when Teddy's 'Rawr's became their most arrogant and condescending, the two leading ladies struck with a massive combo and felled the creature, each punching with all her might from both sides of the big bear, mushing its head in and causing it a great headache, which prompted it to apologize for its wicked ways and retreat to sleep in its cave until summer came again.

         "Yay!" Diana exclaimed. "We won!"

         "And saved those smelly boys!" Zatanna said playfully.

         Diana broke out into a fit of giggles and echoed Zatanna, "Smelly boys!" This prompted more laughter from both woman and woman-child, and when it finally subsided, Diana looked up at her friend. "Wanna play again?"

         But before Zatanna could answer, the phone rang, and since people didn't usually call unless they needed some mystic something, Zatanna couldn't just ignore it. "I've got to get that," she said, standing up and patting Diana on the head, "but when I finish, we can play some more, okay?"

         "'Kay," Diana answered with enthusiasm.

         After Zatanna left, Diana took to lightly playing with the big rubber ball, bouncing it off the floor and the wall and her own head. Until a feeling rose up just below her tummy, a feeling she recognized as a need to pee-pee. She left the ball mid bounce and hurried down the short hallway toward the potty before she had an accident. The bathroom door was open and Diana went in and stopped in front of the seemingly gigantic potty. At her size it looked intimidating, and a part of her feared it might suck her down with the water if she wasn't careful. Still, she was a big girl and big girls had to use the potty, so she resolved to use it no matter what.

Does she make it?
131.title: Playtime

1312.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         She reached up her little arms and tried to find some way to pull herself up, but the porcelain was slick, making it hard to get a grip. Determined, she slipped and struggled, fighting with her hands and even attempting to raise her leg and use her knee to get leverage. But nothing worked. The pressure in her bladder kept building, making her attempts harder to do without letting go, and before too long it was too much. Her muscle control slipped and she peed her pull-up nearly past full.

         At first she just lifted her shirt up and looked down at her swelling training pants. Embarrassment welled up inside her, and her little chin began to quiver. She felt like she'd let Zatanna down. Zatanna was counting on her being a big girl, and big girls didn't go pee-pee in their pants like a little baby. Now Zatanna was going to be disappointed in her; she wouldn't think Diana was a big girl anymore. She'd think Diana was just a messy, little baby. The emotions became too much for Diana to handle. She leaned forward, using the potty to hold herself up and broke out into tears. Initially they were quite little sobs, but before long they'd grown into full-fledged wails, which only got worse as the wet, cold feeling of her soaked pull-up sat in.

         In mere seconds, Zatanna came sprinting into the bathroom, very much afraid Diana had hurt herself. "Are you okay? What happened?"

         "I. Sorry. Ta. Nna," Diana managed between sobs.

         "What's wrong?" Zatanna asked, rushing over to kneel in front of Diana and check her over for injuries, internally chewing herself out for letting little Diana out of her sight.

         "I. Not. Big. Girl," Diana continued, as the smell reached Zatanna's nose.

         Zatanna made a sympathetic face and kissed little Diana on the forehead. "You had an accident."

         Diana's cries rose again. "I. Sorry."

         "Shh," Zatanna said, hugging the child. "It's okay. It's okay. If anything it's my fault."

         "Uh-uh," Diana protested. "I went. Pee-pee. Like a. Baby."

         "Only because you couldn't reach the potty. But that's an adult potty." Diana looked up into Zatanna's face, her tears clearing somewhat as the magician continued. "It's too big for you. I should have made a potty for you. I just forgot."

         "You. Not. Mad?"

         Zatanna hugged the girl again and gave her a playful shake. "Not at all. You realized you needed to go potty all by yourself, didn't you?"

         Diana considered this, pursing her lips together as she thought it over. "Yeah. I did."

         "Which is what big girls do," said Zatanna. "It's my fault."

         This made Diana think even more. She knew that if she did something wrong, she'd be punished, so she couldn't help but wonder, "Will you be punished, Tanna?"

         Zatanna tried not to laugh at Diana's earnest concern. "Do you think I should be?"

         "Mamma told me that if I do something bad, I get punished."

         "Well, if your mamma told you that, then I guess I'll have to be punished. But before I do, let's get you cleaned up, okay?"

         "'Kay," Diana agreed, then added, "You won't be punished bad, will you?"

         "No, just a little down time to remind me to be a better babysitter. Now, let's get you clean."

         Zatanna pulled off the tabs holding the pull-up in place and gently removed it, instructing Diana when to step and being careful not to rub dampness on the girl's legs. She folded up the training pants and threw them in the garbage, then ran some warm water over a washrag and cleaned Diana, a task made more difficult by Diana's ticklish laughter. Then the magician helped Diana lay down on her back and slid a new pull-up in place. "Nice and clean!" Zatanna announced with she was done, then helped Diana back to her feet and gave her a playful swat on the behind.

         "Nice and clean!" Diana echoed.

         "Now, stand over here a sec," Zatanna instructed, moving Diana away from the toilet, then she made a few moves with her hands and said, "A gniniart yttop rof anaiD."

         And after a glow of light, a small training potty shaped like a horse, with handles at the ears appeared beside the grown up potty.

         Diana clapped in glee. "Pony!"

         "Now the next time you have to go, you have somewhere to go."

         This pleased Diana to no end, but once she got over her happiness, she remembered something. She put her hands on her little hips and turned to Zatanna. "Don't forget, Tanna. You get punished."

         "You're right," Zatanna said, chuckling at the girl's serious manner. "Thanks for the reminder."

         "But who gonna punish you?"

         "I'll handle it. Since I made you feel like you weren't a big girl, when you clearly are, I think it's only fair I spend a little time as a littler girl. But only for a little while because I have to fix us some lunch later, okay?"

         The thought of her big friend being littler than her made Diana happy and she readily agreed.

         Zatanna made a few hand motions and incanted, "yM ydob a ybab."



How young does Zatanna get?
1312.title: Diana Doesn't Make It

choices: Back to her old age with a diaper.
A 16 year old with a diaper.
13122.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         The same light that had earlier surrounded Diana now surrounded Zatanna. Her adult features and curves softened, straightened and otherwise narrowed as her body shrank into itself, the physical years melting away until she was just over a year old. Her tuxedo top changed into a toddler version of the same, and her panties flared out and grew into a thick, white diaper.

         Diana clapped at her new, little playmate and shouted, "Let's play!"

         Diana corralled lil Zatanna, who she'd taken to thinking of as her lil sis, back into the living room where the toys were. They bypassed the action figures and stuffed animals for a box full of building blocks. Zatanna tried to open the box's latches a few times, but her hands were too small and clumsy for the job.

         Diana, feeling proud and older sister-like, patted Zatanna on her padded bum, gently moving the smaller girl aside. "Let me, lil Tanna. I the big girl."

         When her playmate scooted out of the way, Diana popped the box open and dumped the blocks out onto the floor. Diana started clicking blocks together with no real concern or idea as to what she was doing; she was too busy having fun clicking and unclicking to care about designs. Eventually she decided it would be fun to see how high she could build a stack before it fell over. Not understanding the finer points of architecture or geometry, she didn't do too well, but she didn't care. When the blocks fell over she just cheered and tried again.

         Zatanna on the other hand was having a harder go of things. Her motor skills being that of a toddler, she could barely get the blocks to click together despite her best efforts of concentration. For the most part, she just sat on her well-padded tush and smacked the blocks around, enjoying Diana's building attempts more than her own. Diana noticed her new lil sis was having problems and crawled over to her.

         "You need me help you, little baby?"

         Seeing that big sister look on the currently older girl's face, Zatanna couldn't not let her help. She nodded. "Yeah. This is too hard for me."

         "That 'cause you a little baby," Diana explained helpfully, patting Zatanna's diaper again to help make her point. "And I big sis, so I help you."

         They spent nearly half an hour clicking blocks together, only to take them apart and reassemble them in new nonsensical ways. Diana alternated between helping Zatanna push the blocks in place and just pointing where the next blocks should go.

         After a while, Diana sat up straight and looked at Zatanna in shock. "Uh-oh," she said.

         "What's wrong?" Zatanna asked, concern showing in her tiny eyes. Her first thought was that Diana had had another accident and she was going to have to age up to change her friend, which she really didn't want to do because she was having fun.

         Fortunately Zatanna's first thought was wrong.

         Diana put her hands on her hips and gave Zatanna the sort of serious look that only a three-year-old can when she's trying really hard to act grown up. "I think baby Tanna made wet-wet."

         Having not considered the possibility that she wouldn't be able to control herself in her current state, Zatanna's eyes went wide, and she reached down and patted her diaper, going as far as to stick a few fingers inside to check for wetness, a move made more difficult due to her reduced motor skills. She managed to get her fingers in after much wiggling and found—to her relief—she was dry. "No, I think I'm okay," she said.

         This did nothing to satisfy Diana, who shook her head at the baby. "No, I think lil sis made wet-wet," she said, thoroughly convinced.

         She scooted over and stuck her fingers down in Zatanna's diaper, like she'd seen Zatanna just do. Then she nodded. "Yep, lil Tanna made wet-wet. Mommy need change you."

         It occurred to Zatanna that Diana just wanted to play pretend mommy, so she played along. "You're right, mommy. I made wet-wet. Will you change my diaper?"

         "Uh-uh," Diana said, shaking her head emphatically, which confused Zatanna.

         "Why not?"

         "Babies cry when they wet-wet," Diana said matter-of-a-factly. "You hafta cry. Then mommy change you."

         Zatanna felt more than a little self-conscious. It was one thing to regress her body and play with toys, but crying and acting like a fussy, wet baby was, well it felt weird. But she decided to play the part because Diana wanted her to.

         The first thing the mini-sorceress did was stick her thumb in her mouth and suck it, trying to act all nonchalant and babyish. Then, with her free hand she patted her diapered crotch, imagining that her bladder had just loosed. Her little baby face scrunched up around her still sucked thumb into a cute little pout, her lips poking out and trembling. The trembling lasted only a second before it gave way to the best babyish wails Zatanna could muster. "Whaaaaaaaaa! Ah-whaaaaa! Ah-whaaaaaa!" She balled up her tiny fists and rubbed them against her eyes, as if to fight the tears. "Wha-wha-whaaaaa! Whaaaaaa-haa-haa-haaaaa!"

         "There, there, little baby," Diana soothed, hugging the bawling baby and kissing her on the cheek. "It all right. Mommy take care of you."

         Zatanna sobbed, her 'cries' dying down as she decided to go all in for the act. "Weawwy? Mama thange diapoo?"

         "Yep, mommy get you new diaper." She helped Zatanna onto her back, where the younger girl took to sucking her thumb and cooing in gibberish. Diana play acted pulling the tabs of the diaper open—mostly because she couldn't get them to really open with her little hands. She pulled back the invisible, wet diaper and made a face. "Shoo. You stinky."

         Zatanna replied with a, "Boo gah bah."

         Next Diana pantomimed powdering her baby, going so far as to pat and rub her charge's diaper to spread the pretend powder. Then she slipped a new invisible diaper under Zatanna and taped it up.

         "Baby clean," the little Amazonian announced.

         "Bay-bee cwean?" Zatanna echoed.

         "Yep."

         "Yay!"

         Diana bent down and blew a raspberry on Zatanna's tummy, then another, then another, causing them both to giggle uncontrollably. Eventually she let up and exclaimed, "Now we play!"

         With much effort, Zatanna worked her way to sitting. "Actually, I think it's time for lunch."

         "Noooo," Diana pouted. "Not hungry."

         "Diana, you need to eat," Zatanna said, fully realizing how ridiculous it must look for a toddler to be giving instructions to an older girl. "Otherwise you won't have any energy to play."

         "But you hafta get big," Diana said, whining. "I want you to stay little."

         Truth be told, Zatanna was having more fun than she'd planned being the little sister here, so she came up with an idea. "How about this? I'll grow up and fix us some lunch, then I'll age back down and play with you a little while longer."

         "Promise?"

         "Promise."



How Old Does Zatanna get?
13122.title: Baby Zatanna

131221.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         A few backwardly spoken words later and Zatanna was back to her usual self, but in a sign that she wasn't planning on staying big for long, she left her diaper on, just making it grow with her. Upon seeing the adult Zatanna still clad in a diaper, Diana broke out laughing. "You look silly, Tanna. Like a big baby."

         Zatanna, who was gathering lunch supplies, stuck her tongue out at the girl. "You better watch it, princess, I'm big enough to give you a spanking."

         "Nuh-uh," Diana protested. "You in diapers. I the big girl. So I spank you."

         "Oh, really?"

         Diana reached up and swatted Zatanna's diapered behind. Even though the little Amazon's hit felt like less than nothing, especially though the diaper's thick padding, Zatanna jumped and made a surprised noise to play along.

         "See," Diana said, taking Zatanna's act at face value.

         "Guess you're right," Zatanna replied. "I better behave and make lunch."

         She got out a few slices of bread and made them some peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, cut the sandwiches into squares then added some grapes. Finally she magiced up a pair of sippy cups and filled them with milk.          Back on the couch, Diana sat completely mesmerized by the television. The first show had ended, and now she was watching a cartoon about unlikely colored, talking ponies. It was absolutely silly and Diana absolutely loved it. She barely remembered her juice, usually only taking sips during commercial breaks, which mostly annoyed her because they kept interrupting the ponies. The show was almost over before she'd drained her cup. When the show ended, she was pleased to see the next show was another episode of the talking ponies, so she cuddled up with one of the couch pillows and watched, so completely immersed in the show that she didn't realize her bladder was releasing in her pull-ups.

         Eventually, well after the point she'd had to begin magically heating the water, Zatanna stepped out of the shower and dried off. Once dry, she folded up her dirty diaper and taped it shut to throw it away. Just before she dropped it in the waste basket, she stopped and squeezed it lightly in her hands, not enough to make a mess; she just wanted to hear that crinkling sound. Staring at the well used diaper in her hands, she found herself thinking about how soft and comfortable it had felt. The warmth, the bulk of the padding, the soft rustle of the plastic, it was nice. Relaxing. Enjoyable even.

         Zatanna bit her lower lip in hesitation. Then, dropping the old diaper, she made a choice. She called forth her powers and directed them to the sink of her vanity. "A wen repaid rof em."

         A thick, new diaper, not quite as big as the one Zatanna had just disposed of but large enough for her adult form, materialized on the vanity. Zatanna picked it up slowly, still unsure of herself, and squeezed it between her hands. Something about the soothing of the crinkling made her decision easier. She opened it and placed it on the floor, spreading it out as best she could. Next she sat down and lay back, pulling the front of the diaper in place—which took a bit of fussing; she'd never diapered herself before and was finding it more difficult than she thought. Finally, when she got it evened out and taped on, she stood up and observed herself in the mirror.

         Even as a full fledged, and at the moment nearly naked, adult, the diaper lent her a childish appearance. She patted her thickly padded crotch and butt, just to hear the plastic play beneath her touch. Next she turned and checked out the view from behind. The diaper made her bum look disproportionately big, to the point she had to laugh. Then, with a quick look around to make sure no one was watching, she stuck out her bottom lip and pouted at the mirror. The reflection should have looked absurd: a grown woman, with her naked curves, wearing a diaper and making pouty faces, but Zatanna had to admit, she looked cute. She might even have called herself adorable—so long as no one else was around to hear her. Finally, just to complete the picture, she stuck her thumb into her pouting mouth and began sucking it while she shook her diapered bum at the mirror.

131221211121111.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         Walking back to the blanket where they'd slept not long ago, Zatanna knelt down and placed Diana down on it, then sat down in front of her. "So, would you like to not worry about being a big girl?"

         Diana thought about it—though she wasn't quite sure what she was thinking about. She just knew her friend was talking about her not worrying about things like wetting her training pants anymore, and that sounded very good at the moment. So she said, "Yes."

         With what loosely passed as consent, Zatanna drew her energies to herself and said, "ekaM anaiD regnuoy."

         The energy surrounded Diana, and she began to feel a weird tingling. Her arms and legs retracted back into her shrinking torso, and her already soft features softened even more, developing a bit of baby-fat in the process. Her pull-ups thickened, pushing her legs apart, and her shirt shrank to fit her new 18-month-old body.

         When the energy dissipated, little Diana looked up at Zatanna, and when she felt the clammy wetness of her diaper pressing against her little waist, she broke out into lusty wails.

         Zatanna shook her head and smiled patiently. "Guess I should have seen that one coming."

         Zatanna magiced up some changing supplies and set to work. She eased the still crying Diana onto her back and tickled the girl's belly in an attempt to calm her. Diana did not find the tickling amusing, so Zatanna untaped Diana's diaper, lifted her little bottom and cleaned her off with some wipes. Diana made things difficult with her constant kicking and squirming, but Zatanna eventually got her cleaned up and slid a new diaper into place. Which of course did nothing to deter Diana's wiggling.

         "Diana, I need you to hold still please," Zatanna said. When the child continued her antics, Zatanna said with a bit more of an authoritative edge, "Diana." At that the little hero looked up at Zatanna and pouted but otherwise held still as she was powdered and taped up.

         "Good girl," Zatanna praised when she'd finished.

         "Good giww," Diana echoed, clapping.

         After being helped to her feet, Diana took a few experimental steps and fell down. She looked up at Zatanna in confusion, as if she were looking for a clue as to whether she should be crying now or not. Zatanna, very much wanting to avoid any crying, knelt down and giggled as she tickled Diana's tummy. "Did you fall down? Did you fall down?"

         To her relief, Diana laughed and readily accepted help back to her feet. She made it a few steps before turning herself in an angle she wasn't quite ready for and plopping down again. And again Zatanna came to her aid. This time the pampered princess caught sight of Zatanna's unusual choice of underwear and pointed at it when the magician knelt in front of her. "Diapoo!" she exclaimed. "Tanna diapoo!"

         Trying not to blush, Zatanna looked down at her padding and nodded. "Yeah. Zatanna's wearing a diaper, too."

         This seemed to please Diana. She clapped and burbled and said a lot of things that weren't really words, but Zatanna nodded as if she understood. Eventually, Diana made her own way back up to her feet and toddled off to nowhere in particular, which ended up being toward the coffee table and it's very exposed edge. Which brought Zatanna to the quick realization that her apartment wasn't exactly baby proof—even if that baby was an Amazon. She hurried over to her friend and took her by the hands, leading her back to the relative safety of the blanket she'd been changed on.

         Upon being grabbed, Diana looked up at her and frowned. She didn't like being led around, not when she wanted to explore. "No," she said.

         "No?" Zatanna repeated, trying not to laugh.

         "No," Diana repeated, trying to pull her hands away from Zatanna's grip. She was, to no surprise, stronger than the average toddler, but not quite strong enough to overpower a fully grown adult.

         "Diana, it's dangerous over here. Why don't you come play where it's safer?"

         "No," she said, wrinkling her mouth up in defiance.

         Zatanna sighed. "You're not going to make this easy, are you?"

         "No."

         "Now you're just saying 'no' to mess with me," she said. Careful to not hurt the girl, Zatanna pulled her back away from the table.

         Which did not sit well with the little princess. She let her legs go, flopping down on her bottom, and cried.

         "Diana, that's not how you get what you want."

         Still the toddler cried.

         "Okay, maybe if you keep it up long enough, it is," Zatanna conceded, rubbing her ears. "I can just see it now: The magnificent Zatanna, mistress of the mystic, proud member of the Justice League, defeated by a bawling babe." Then she looked down at her own crotch and added, "All while wearing a diaper herself."

         Instead of paying attention to Zatanna's banter, Diana kept up with the wailing. If anything, she just got louder.

         "How about some food?" Zatanna asked hopefully.

         This at least brought the fit down a level, enough for Diana to ask, "Din-din?"



How Does Zatanna Feed Diana?
131221211121111.title: 1 and ½ years younger

1312212111211112.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         "Yeah, din-din. Hopefully you like bananas and peanut butter sandwiches because that's all I've got. And trust me, you do not want to eat magically created food. It never tastes right."

         The promise of a peanut butter sandwich and a banana was enough to quiet the girl's cries, and being asked to help Zatanna in the kitchen pushed her into excitement. Even when it turned out that by, "help me in the kitchen," Zatanna really meant, "sit here at my feet and play with a spatula", Diana was still happy, slapping the spatula around on the floor and the cabinets and Zatanna's leg, while the magician fixed half a peanut butter sandwich and then sliced it and the banana into bite-sized pieces.

         She took the finished product, along with a sippy cup of milk to the table in the living room. Everything was going so well, right up to the point where she picked Diana up and put her in a high chair.

         "Nooooo," Diana whined as Zatanna worked her tush into place. Then, when Zatanna was trying to fend off Diana's waving arms while locking the tray in place, Diana blew up. She tossed her head back and screamed at the ceiling. She cried and screamed and thrashed her arms wildly, not wanting to be penned in.

         Zatanna managed to get her charge locked in, then gave Diana an exasperated look. She knew it wasn't Diana's fault. It was just part of being a toddler. "Diana," she said patiently, "you need to sit in the high chair."

         "Nooooo!" she cried even louder.

         "Diana," she repeated, making a conscious effort to hold her tone steady, "you're being very mean."

         "No!" Diana declared.

         Zatanna swallowed the urge to say something sarcastic about how convincing an argument that was, figuring it wouldn't help things. Instead she said, "I think someone's fussy. Maybe because she's hungry?"

         Diana didn't say anything, but she'd stopped crying for the moment. Though she was still pouting heavily. If she stuck her bottom lip out any farther, Zatanna was worried it might dislodge.

         "I can't feed you until you stop fussing."

         Diana eyed the plate on the table and appeared to weigh her options. Eventually she said, "'Kay."

         "You're going to behave?"

         "Yes."

         "You promise?"

         "Yes," Diana repeated with a nod.

         Not fully convinced but willing to try, Zatanna put the plate down on the tray and started to pick up a slice of banana.

         "Me," Diana declared, reaching out for the slice.

         "You want to feed yourself?" Again Diana nodded. "Okay. But don't make a mess," Zatanna said, knowing full well how unlikely that was.

         While Diana made a mess all over her face, stuffing banana slices and sandwich squares into and around her mouth, Zatanna went and fixed a sandwich for herself. She'd barely finished half of it before Diana declared loudly, "All gone!"

         "Already?" Zatanna asked returning to the high chair. She looked between the empty plate and Diana's full face. "You made a mess, missy."

         Diana giggled like she'd done something extremely funny. Zatanna shook her head and started to head back to the kitchen to get a rag, but she barely made it three steps before Diana started in again.

         "Down!" she demanded, and when she wasn't immediately accommodated, she repeated, "Down, down, down!"

         "We need to get you cleaned up first," Zatanna told her.

         "Want down!"

         Zatanna walked back enough to look the toddler in the eye and said, with as much calm as she could, "We need to clean you up first. Otherwise you're going to make an even bigger mess."

         "Now!" Diana said, and when 'now' didn't come quickly enough, she balled up her fists and threw a tantrum, slamming the high chair's tray repeatedly and screaming at the top of her lungs.

         At first Zatanna didn't know what to do. Mothering just wasn't her thing. Never had been. There seemed to be only one option open to her, but it was one she didn't want to try, especially since Diana was, despite the current treatment, her friend. She made one last plea. "Diana, please. You're being mean. Just let me wipe your face, and then we'll get you down."

         Instead of calming down, Diana's tantrum grew. She added kicking her legs wildly to her tiny fist pummeling and loud yelling.

         Out of obvious options, Zatanna put some heat in her voice and said, "Diana, if you don't stop this right now, you're getting a spanking."

         Diana paused long enough to give the magician a studying look, then burst right back into her tantrum. It was the stop and look before continuing that got to Zatanna, like the little tot didn't believe she had the guts to spank her. With a huff, Zatanna marched back to the kitchen to wet a rag, and when she came back, she silently fought off Diana's swinging arms and jerking head well enough to get the girl's face clean.

         When she unlocked the high chair tray and pulled it back, Diana stopped her tantrum and looked pleased, thinking she'd won. Quickly enough, as Zatanna pulled her up out of the high chair and across her lap, Diana learned differently.

         "Noooo," she pleaded.

         "Diana, you've done nothing but throw fits and disobey me since you reached this age. I don't want to do this, but you need to learn to obey."

         "Nooo," she repeated, putting as much sugar in her voice as she could. "I be good."

         Zatanna hesitated. Some part of her knew she probably needed to make good on her promise to discipline the girl, but another part of her just did not like the idea of spanking her friend. After all, it was Zatanna who'd made Diana this age, so she couldn't really blame the pampered princess for being a persistent pain. Or so she thought.

         "I be good. I be good," Diana repeated, sensing she might get clear of this. "I pwomise."

         Her cutesy little voice and bad pronunciation were too much for Zatanna. She sighed and lifted the child to sit on her lap. "Okay," she relented, "but if I have to do this again, there will be spankings. Lots of spankings. Understand?"

         "Yeth," Diana assured her. "I be good."

         Now clean and finished eating, Zatanna let Diana down, and the girl instantly made for the newly magiced toys. She selected some soft blocks at random and took to stacking them. She even tried lining them up to form words, which mostly ended up in nonsense. While she played and burbled on, sometimes in real words and sometimes not, Zatanna cleaned up the high chair before moving on to do the same to the kitchen.
1312212111211112.title: Hand make her a sandwich

13122121112111121.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         After she finished cleaning, Zatanna returned to the living room and took a seat, content to watch Diana play for a little while. The mini Amazon had moved on to some stuffed animals, focusing mostly on a floppy eared dog and a plump bear. She was bouncing them back and forth, making quasi-correct barks and grrrs and occasionally having the animals talk to each other. As Zatanna watched, she found herself wanting to join in. Playing little sis to Diana earlier had been fun, but with Diana not being so well behaved at this age, Zatanna was afraid she wouldn't be able to keep Diana under control—or worse, Diana or her could get hurt and she'd be too small to do anything to help. So she stayed big. However, when she was sure Diana wasn't watching, she poked and pressed at her diaper, enjoying the crinkling it made and the soft, plush feel under her fingers.

         It was a peaceful moment, which meant it was not to last long. And last long it did not. Seemingly out of nowhere, and for no reason Zatanna could see, Diana burst into tears. "Whaaaaaa! Wh-wh-whaaaaaaaa! Whaaaaaaaa-ha-ha-haaaaaa!"

         Zatanna was at her side in a blink, kneeling beside her. "What's wrong, Diana?"

         Diana responded with more crying. But unlike her earlier tantrums, there was no wild swinging of hands or feet. She was just sitting there, her head cocked back, bawling at the ceiling. Zatanna gently checked her over, thinking maybe she'd cut herself on something or maybe she'd stubbed a toe or mashed a finger. Then the smell hit.

         "Aw," Zatanna soothed. "Did you wet your diaper?"

         Still crying, Diana managed to nod her head yes.

         Zatanna scooped her up and bounced her lightly, kissing her on the forehead and whispering, "It's okay. We're going to get you all cleaned up. We'll get you a nice clean diaper, and you'll be all dry and happy. How's that sound?"

         The soft sounds of Zatanna's voice worked, and Diana's cries subsided to mostly sobs. She placed Diana on the blanket from earlier and tickled her tummy as she untaped the diaper. Diana giggled until Zatanna stopped. As Zatanna pulled the diaper open and started wiping her down, Diana stuck her thumb in her mouth and sucked on it blissfully.

         Zatanna lifted Diana's little tush and replaced the soiled diaper with a new one, and then she lowered and powdered her. "There," she said when she'd finished the last tape, "all clean."

         "Aww cwean?"

         "Yep. You're a clean, mean diapered machine," she said. She would have felt silly for saying something like that, but Diana's giggles were enough to make her overlook the lameness. "So, what now, princess?"



Does Diana want Zatanna to be her mother or playmate?
13122121112111121.title: Diana Wets Her Diaper

131221211121111212.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         Without missing a beat, Diana pointed at her and said, "You baby!"

         "No," Zatanna said, "I don't think that's a good idea. Someone needs to be big to make sure nothing bad happens."

         Diana crawled around until she was nearly underneath the crouching Zatanna, and when she got there, she patted at the woman's diaper. "You baby!"

         It was too cute for Zatanna to reprimand her, and it wasn't like Diana was doing anything wrong. Still, Zatanna felt she needed to put a foot down here. "Diana, I need to stay big. So I can take care of you."

         "Peetend," Diana replied.

         "Pee tend?" Zatanna repeated, not comprehending.

         "Peeten!"

         And then it struck her. "Oh, you mean pretend."

         "Yeth! Peetend!"

         Zatanna scrunched up her face. It was one thing to regress herself to a baby and act out. It was one thing to be an adult wearing a big, fluffy diaper. But to act out like a baby while being an adult wearing a big, fluffy diaper, she wasn't sure if she was up for that. On the other hand, being a baby had been fun. And she was enjoying the feel of her diaper. Plus, she reasoned, it would just be mean to deny Diana the chance to play, especially since all this was for Diana's sake.

         "Pwease peetend," Diana said, her bottom lip sticking out too adorably for Zatanna to refuse.

         "Okay, okay," she said. "You win, you win."

         "You baby!" Diana clapped and squealed.

         "I baby," Zatanna replied, giving her head an exaggerated, silly shake as she spoke.

         At that, she plopped back on her butt, which she wiggled around on the blanket, enjoying the way all her padding felt bunching up on her behind. Although at this point, she wasn't really sure what to do. When she'd regressed herself, her body pretty much took care of things so that she didn't need to concentrate on being babyish. In fact, she found she had to concentrate to be not too babyish. But now that she was an adult in body and mind, she just felt foolish. But Diana was watching her expectantly, waiting for her to be a baby.

         So she did the first thing she could think of. The exact thing she'd done earlier in the bathroom. She shoved her thumb in her mouth and sucked it. And that turned out to be all Diana needed to believe the 'transformation' was complete.

         "You baby!" Diana repeated in glee. "Come pway!"

         Diana led the way back to the toys, and Zatanna, deciding that getting up and walking would kill the 'illusion', crawled along behind the tot. When they reached the toys, Diana claimed the bear as hers and shoved the dog in Zatanna's hands with an emphatic, "You doggy."

         Trying not to laugh at what sounded like her friend calling her a dog, Zatanna plopped down on her butt and bounced the stuffed dog around, saying, "Arf, arf, arf."

         "Grrrr," Diana's bear said, and then she began smacking it against the dog in an 'attack'. She was less than coordinated in her attack, and hit Zatanna with the bear's hard nose a few times.

         After one hit too many, Zatanna said, "Hey, play nice."

         Diana pouted fiercely at her friend, upset that she'd broken character.

         With a sigh, Zatanna corrected herself, "Pway nice."

         "Beaw eat doggy."

         "Well maybe these two—" Another big pout and Zatanna took a deep breath. Staying in character while trying to correct the girl was hard. "These fwiends."

         "Nuh-uh," Diana retorted, shaking her head as though hers was the one and only truth. "Beaw eat doggy."

         A thought struck Zatanna. She realized she was in a unique position to get back at her friend. After all, she was supposed to be a baby now, so it wasn't like she was being mean. She was just playing the part Diana wanted her to. She stuck out her bottom lip and shook the dog. "Be fwiends."

         "Grrr," said Diana renewing the bear's attack. Which was all the provocation Zatanna needed.

         The diapered woman clutched the dog to her chest and flopped back onto the floor, where she began stamping her feet and 'crying'. "Whaaaaa! Whaaaaaa! Whaaa! Diana meeeeaaaan! Whaaa!"

         "No!" Diana said, shaking her finger at the whining woman.

         "Whaaaaa!" Zatanna responded in a louder voice. "Whaaaa! Whaaaaaaaa!"

         Unlike with Zatanna earlier, Diana didn't hesitate. She waddled over and smacked Zatanna a good one on her diapered behind.

         At first the action shocked Zatanna. The girl hadn't even given Zatanna the option to cutesy her way out of it. She hadn't given any warning at all. So Zatanna threw a bigger fit. She stomped and slapped her hands on the floor—mindful not to catch Diana by mistake—and let her lungs go. "Whaaaaaa! Wh-wh-whaaaaaaa! Whaaaaaa!"

         In lieu of another spanking, Diana teased her flailing friend, "You cwy-baby."

         "Am not," Zatanna retorted.

         "Tanna cwy-baby," Diana taunted, shaking her head in time with her words. "Cwy-baby, cwy-baby. Tanna cwy-baby."

         Zatanna hadn't really been expecting to have the tables turned on her and found it somewhat upsetting that the 18-month-old was handling the adult's temper tantrum better than the adult had handled the 18-month-old's. Still, she rolled with it. "Uh-uh," she protested, shoving her thumb back in her mouth with an exaggerated pout.

         Diana gave her a quick swat on the diaper and Zatanna responded with a whiny, "Uhhhh." And when Diana delivered another smack, Zatanna gave an even whinier, "Uh-hnn. Uh-hnnn. Uh-hnnn."

         "Cwy widdle baby," taunted Diana with another smack.

         And this time Zatanna gave it something extra. She closed her eyes, drew in a deep breath and bawled for all she was worth. "Ah-whaaaaaa! Ah-whaaaaaaa! Whaaaaa-ha-ha-haaaaaa! Wh—"
131221211121111212.title: Adult Playmate With a Diaper

choices: No (Diana Stop her and she wet the diaper)
1312212111211112122.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         Her eyes popped open in surprise as she found a pacifier shoved in her mouth mid cry. She turned her head to find Diana looking positively triumphant. And having just been bested by a toddler, Zatanna resigned herself to play along. After all, Diana'd earned it.

         Zatanna sucked heavily on the pacifier, making sure Diana could tell she was sucking on it, and ended all signs of her tantrum. Diana smiled at her—almost as if she'd known what she was doing—and Zatanna smiled back, still sucking.

         The tantrum now over, and Diana somehow victorious, the girl patted Zatanna's head and stroked her face. "Thewe. Good baby. Baby Tanna good baby."

         Despite the fact that it made her feel utterly silly, Zatanna burbled a series of non-words around the paci, and Diana kissed her on the forehead. Then she picked up Zatanna's discarded dog and offered it back to her saying, "Fwiends?"

         Zatanna accepted the dog and hugged it to her. "Tay."

         And so Diana retrieved her bear and they played the next several minutes, arf-ing and grr-ing as the stuffed animals danced and hugged each other.

         As they played, apparently having forgotten the tantrum, Zatanna's bladder began to send warning signs that evacuation was imminent, and before long she was squirming where she sat.



Does Zatanna get to the bathroom?
1312212111211112122.title: Zatanna Keeps Playing Along

13122121112111121222.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         "Uh, Diana," she said when she was sure holding it wasn't going to be an option for much longer, "I need to go use the bathroom."

         Diana looked at her like she'd just said the stupidest thing imaginable. "Nuh-uh."

         "Seriously, Diana, I need to go. Like right now."

         But Diana just shook her head and pointed at the woman's crotch, saying simply, "Diapoo."

         "No," said Zatanna, shaking her own head. "I'm not going in my diaper."

         "Tanna baby," Diana insisted. "You say. You pwomise."

         "I said I'd pretend—"

         Diana pasted on another of her undeniably adorable pouts and said in her sweetest, most hurt voice. "Tanna pwomise."

         Zatanna sighed and weighed her options. Diana and she had been playing nicely—peacefully—for nearly half an hour, by far the longest she'd gotten Diana to behave at this age, and Zatanna really wasn't up for another Diana melt down. And besides, she reasoned, she'd been in a wet diaper earlier, just before she'd gotten a shower, so it wasn't like she was totally unused to it. Then again, her brain reminded her, she'd been a physical baby when she'd done the damage, not an adult playing pretend.

         But one more look at Diana's heart-wrenching pout and watery blue eyes made Zatanna's decision for her. She lay back and tried to relax, but letting herself go in a not-on-the-toilet fashion was harder than she thought. Eventually, her bladder beginning to hurt, she managed to get a squirt out, and once that came free, the flood gates opened and she flooded her diaper in a steady stream that sounded like a running river to her ears. Embarrassed at how loud it was, she turned to Diana who was watching her and giggling.

         "Tanna pee-pee," Diana announced, showing she heard the action as well as Zatanna.

         Zatanna's face turned several shades of red, now fully realizing that she—an adult—had just wet her diaper in front of a physical and mental toddler.

         When she finished, her diaper was nearly full. And that wasn't all. It was warm and squishy and felt oddly comfortable pressed against her skin. She reached down and gave the front of her diaper a good press, enjoying the wet, crinkly sound despite the fact that she found it odd. Her embarrassment only grew when Diana stepped forward and poked the diaper with an experimental finger.

         Then she watched the woman expectantly, and it didn't take long for Zatanna to figure out what the girl was waiting for.

         "Whaaaaaa!" she cried, trying not to feel completely like a fool. Which was hard when she considered she, the supposed adult and caretaker, was crying on the floor in a wet diaper. "Whaaaaa-ha-ha-haaaaaa! Uh-uh-whaaaaa!"

         As Zatanna cried, Diana's face took on a strained expression and grew beet red. Just before Zatanna stopped her fake hissy fit to make sure Diana was okay, Diana broke into a wide smile and patted her friend on the arm. "It 'kay, Tanna," she said. "Me wet-wet."

         "You wet-wet?" Zatanna repeated, quieting her cries.

         Diana poked out her little diaper as proof and repeated, "Me wet-wet!"

         With a smile born from Diana making the 'baby' feel better, Zatanna sat up and scooped the girl into a hug, one Diana happily returned.
13122121112111121222.title: Diana Stop her and she wet the diaper

131221211121111212221.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         And then the smell hit. Zatanna pulled back so Diana could see her and scrunched up her face. "Shoo, someone needs a bath."

         Diana giggled. "Tanna 'tinky!"

         "You're 'tinky," Zatanna replied.

         "Nuh-uh. You 'tinky. 'Tinky-'tinky!"

         At Diana's taunting Zatanna stuck out her tongue. And Diana replied by doing the same. The moment's cuteness was ruined by Zatanna's rapidly cooling diaper. It was to the point she was beginning to squirm—and so was the little princess, which meant another bout of crying was coming. Zatanna wanted to avoid that, so she suggested, "How about we get you cleaned up?"

         "'Kay." Zatanna started to stand up, but at Diana's look, she shrugged and crawled along behind Diana to the bathroom. Once inside, she lay Diana down on the bathroom mat. She turned on the water to what she thought was a good temperature, and while the tub filled she began undressing Diana. When she got Diana down to just her diaper the tub still wasn't quite full, so she passed the time with a tickle attack. She started with Diana's plump little belly, then started randomly attacking her legs, the bottoms of her feet and under her chin. Diana loved it. She squealed and giggled and wiggled. Right up to the point she wet her diaper again and broke out in tears.

         Zatanna made a sympathetic face and picked the girl up to bounce in her lap. "Yeah, guess that one was my fault."

         She finally got Diana somewhat shushed, removed her diaper and placed her gently in the water. The water had some strange affect Zatanna couldn't begin to guess at. As soon as Diana, still sniffling, hit the water, she perked up. She slapped the top of the water playfully, splashing Zatanna more than a few times, and once she spied the rubber duck, she was lost to the world. While Zatanna washed her, Diana tried to sink the duck, laughing every time it bobbed back to the surface. She played and played, totally ignoring the wash cloth and even the shampoo, too absorbed with her duck. And all too soon for the little tot, the fun was over.

         "Time to get out," Zatanna announced.

         "No!" Diana declared, clutching her duck to her.

         "Diana, if you stay in there much longer, you're going to become a prune. Now, come on."

         "No! No wanna!"

         And things had been going so well. Zatanna reached over the side and placed her hands under Diana's arm pits, which was the last straw. Diana threw a classic of a fit, kicking and screaming and flailing, throwing water everywhere, including all over Zatanna. A large bit of it worked its way into the woman's already soaked diaper, making it even cooler and forcing it to balloon out so that she couldn't touch her knees together. "Diana, that's enough."

         "No!"

         Despite Diana's well reasoned protest, Zatanna decided that, in fact, that was enough. She pulled the bawling babe out of the tub and sat her on the towel she'd placed in front of the tub. At first Diana tried to get up, but when she realized she couldn't get out of Zatanna's grip, she threw herself back and continued her hissy fit on the floor.

         Zatanna drew her energies to her and once more said, "ekaM anaiD regnuoy."



How Young does Diana get?
131221211121111212221.title: Bath Time

choices: Let's See What Diana's Up to
1312212111211112122211.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         Mystic energies once again surrounded the Amazon, and limbs and torso shortened, pulling in on themselves as her body retracted and shed even more age. She became even chubbier and her features softened about as much as they could, leaving her around 9-months-old. She still cried but not with the same intensity or purpose. Zatanna figured she was crying mostly because she had been when she'd regressed.

         Zatanna picked her up and bounced her in her arms until Diana broke into a wide smile and giggled. With her now calm, Zatanna placed baby Diana back on the towel and, after adjusting her supplies to match Diana's new age, she powdered and diapered her charge. "There. Isn't that all better?"

         Diana responded with a string of gibberish that Zatanna took as agreement. She took the baby out into the living room and placed her in a newly created playpen. "Okay, you play while I get cleaned up."

         With Diana occupied for a little while—hopefully—Zatanna snuck back to the bathroom, magiced the water heater full, and turned the shower to steamy. All the magic she'd been throwing around was beginning to take its toll. She yawned and stretched, realizing she was going to need some serious sleep to recharge her batteries. Though it seemed she needed more recharging than she first thought, for as she stood there, tiredly peeling off her shirt, it took her a while to place the faint hissing she was hearing. Realizing she was again filling her already full diaper, she yelped sharply and grabbed her padded crotch with both hands. By the time she finished, the diaper was sagging heavily, threatening to fall off her under the weight of its contents.

         At first she was ashamed. She'd just peed herself without even knowing it. Then, enjoying the feeling of being a 'naughty little girl' more than she cared to admit, she gingerly moved to stand in front of the mirror. Her diaper, obviously strained, had slipped nearly halfway down her hips. She blushed at the sight, imagining what her friends and fellow heroes would say if they could have seen the Mistress of the Mystics standing there in an over-soaked diaper. Or worse—her enemies. Slowly, so as to not dislodge her diaper any farther, Zatanna turned to get a view from behind. It was even worse. She could see the wetness peeking through the plastic cover. One drop more and she'd be facing spillage.

         The oddest part was, despite being strapped into absorbent undergarments with a large helping of her own pee, Zatanna wasn't the least bit disgusted. Something about it, something in her reflection, made her feel relaxed. Happy. Innocent. She jutted out her bottom lip at the mirror and, mindful to keep her voice quiet enough not to be heard outside the bathroom, whined, "Me wet!"

         She toddled over to the towel she'd changed Diana on, holding her diaper up with both hands because while she may have found all this babyish stuff fun and exciting, she had no desire to clean up a pee-pee explosion from a dropped diaper.

         Sitting down the soaked padding mashed and ran against her skin, causing Zatanna to shudder. She started to untape herself, but instead she lay all the way back to the floor. Then she stuck her thumb in her mouth and flailed her free hand and feet around playfully.

         After a few minutes of secret pretend, Zatanna removed her diaper and jumped in the shower.
1312212111211112122211.title: 9 Month Old Wonder Baby

13122121112111121222112.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         Back in the playpen, Diana's tongue hung out of her pressed lips in concentration. She'd found one of those big, round balls with shapes cut out that you were supposed to shove the correct shaped plastic toys into. She banged a triangle against an oval-shaped hole, trying her hardest to force it in. Eventually she gave up and moved on to the next hole, a star that likewise refused to let the triangle pass. Finally she found the triangle hole. She pushed the plastic piece in place and it fell noisily through. This delighted Diana to no end. "Yay!" she exclaimed and looked up to share her joy with her friend with an excited, if garbled, "Ah gah boo ah to ga ga!"

         But no one was there. She was all alone. Her friend had somehow disappeared when she wasn't looking. Desperation growing, Diana used the net sides of the playpen to pull herself to standing and looked wildly around the empty room. "Ta-Na? Ta-Na!" Fear begin to set in. She didn't want to be alone. She didn't like it. She wanted her Ta-Na, and she wanted her now. "Taaaaaa-Naaaaaaaa!"

         And when Zatanna didn't show, Diana collapsed hard on her thickly cushioned bum and bawled her little eyes out.

         Zatanna was oblivious to Diana's cries, until she turned off the shower and climbed out. At that point she nearly freaked. Then froze. She didn't want to run out there naked, but she'd forgotten to bring in any clean clothes. So she did the first thing she could think of. She called up her magic and directed it at her waist. "A wen repaid rof em." And while the diaper was still forming around her, she grabbed the shirt she'd been wearing and shrugged it on as she ran to make sure nothing had happened to her friend.

         "Taaaa-ha-haaaaa-Naaaaa-ha-haa-haaaa!" was the first thing she heard when she reached the pen and checked Diana over.

         "It's all right, Diana. It's all right. I'm here now," she soothed. "Just tell me what's the matter."

         At hearing her friend's voice, Diana looked up and immediately stuck out her arms. "Ta-Na! Ta-Na!"

         Getting the hint, Zatanna lifted the pint-sized princess out of the pen and bounced the baby on her hip. "Aw. You were scared, weren't you?"

         "Ab ah guh boo, Ta-Na!"

         "It's okay," Zatanna said as if she'd understood that. "I'm here now. And you're okay."

         To demonstrate how okay everything was, Zatanna lifted the princess up and blew a messy raspberry into her belly button. Diana sputtered and squealed in delight. So Zatanna did it again. And again.
13122121112111121222112.title: Let's See What Diana's Up to

131221211121111212221121.content:
(This one is sort of original.)

         When she got tired of hefting the wonder tot, she hitched Diana back on her own diapered hip and bounced her as she walked around. She notice Diana was starring at her chest and her tummy make a grumbling sound.

         "I guess someone wants a little snack before bed doesn't she?" Zatanna asked. Diana burbled what Zatanna took to be an agreement, and Zatanna focus what is left of her magic over her chest.

         "yM ydob gnicudorp tsaerb klim." Zatanna chanted. She felt her breast increase one cup size. She pull up her shirt to reviel her breast, and wasted no time lifting Diana up to one of them. Diana latch on then suckled noisily and happily. Soon Zatanna started to feel that the breast that Diana was suckling on was almost empty so she switch Diana to the other breast.

         Diana stop indicating she was full. Zatanna lifted the baby to her shoulder and gently patted Diana's back until she let loose a serious, "Uuurrrrp!"

         "Good girl," Zatanna praised as she wiped off Diana's face.

         As the cleaning finished, it was obvious Diana was having trouble keeping her little eyes open. "I think someone's tired. You've had a busy day, haven't you?"

         Diana barely responded when Zatanna scooped her up and took her to the bedroom, where she lowered the almost sleeping Diana into a crib at the foot of her bed. The baby Amazon murmured some non-words as Zatanna tucked a blanket around her. And then, just before she slipped away to slumber, Diana said, "Uv oo, Ma-Ma Ta-Na."

         Zatanna couldn't keep a grin from splitting her face. She brushed the tot's forehead with a light finger and whispered, "I love you too, Diana. Sleep sweet."
131221211121111212221121.title: Zatanna Breastfeeds Diana

1312212111211112122211212.content:
(This is sort of original)

         Zatanna dreamt the next couple of days like a plan and she was either disturbed or inspire by it. 'If Diana wants to be a baby for the next couple of days must as well give her the full experince.' she though as an inhuman wail tore Zatanna from her sleep the next morning, and the magician discovered two important things. First, to be such a small, angelic looking baby, Diana could generate some loud, unnerving cries. Second, she was leaking milk.

         Zatanna went over to Diana's crib then she eased her little friend up onto her shoulder and gently patted Diana's bottom. "Shhhh. Let's get you out of those nasty, wet diapers. And into something nice and clean."

         She lay Diana down where she'd just changed herself. Diana sucked her thumb and bounced her legs as Zatanna hummed a little tune and cleaned her off. She kept bouncing her legs while Zatanna tried to get her new diaper on.

         "Okay, you little wiggle worm, stop bouncing and let me put your diaper on."

         Giggling as if it were a game, Diana increased the leg bouncing and slapped the floor with the hand not in her mouth.

         "That how it is, huh?" Zatanna asked, narrowing her eyes playfully. "Okay then. Just remember, you asked for it."

         She drew in a deep breath and blew a big, noisy raspberry on Diana's stomach. Diana convulsed with laughter, patting Zatanna on the head with her hands. Zatanna blew another one and Diana's whole body shook with laughter. Zatanna took the opportunity to gently grab Diana's ankles and left her bum up. "Oh-ho-ho! I got you!" She slid the diaper in place and strapped the princess in. "Someone's in her diaper, someone's in her diaper," Zatanna sang.

         Unlike her fussy 18-month-old self, 9-month-old Diana found this hysterical. She giggled and clapped and sputtered excited sounds that were probably meant to be words. And then she caught sight of Zatanna's wet shirt and quiet down. Zatanna took the silence as if she knew what Diana wants next.

         "I bet someone want's a snack." sang Zatanna as she took off her shirt and lifted Diana up to one of her naked breast. Just like before Diana latch on and begin to suckle. Sweet breast milk was Diana's reward. When Diana was done; Zatanna lifted the baby to her shoulder and gently patted Diana's back until she let loose a serious, "Uuurrrrp!"

         Zatana sat down with Diana in her arms. Zatanna sat back and rubbed the little princess's little belly, "Well, Diana, what do you think? This an okay vacation? Or are you ready to come back?"

         Lying on her back, Diana held her arms up and said, "Ma ma."

         Trying to bite back the smile that threatened to swallow her face, Zatanna reached down and kissed Diana on the forehead. "Well, I guess it probably wouldn't hurt to give you a few more days off, huh?"

         Diana cooed and clapped in agreement.
