         When she got tired of hefting the wonder tot, she hitched Diana back on her own diapered hip and bounced her as she walked to the kitchen. Once there, Zatanna grabbed a bottle from the fridge and sat about heating it. "I'm thinking a little snack and then bed time. What about you?"

         Diana burbled what Zatanna took to be an agreement, and the bottle now warm, Zatanna wasted no time putting it in Diana's mouth.

         Diana suckled noisily and happily as Zatanna bounced her around the kitchen, and when the bottle was empty, she handed it back to her caretaker. Zatanna lifted the baby to her shoulder and gently patted Diana's back until she let loose a serious, "Uuurrrrp!"

         "Good girl," Zatanna praised as she wiped off Diana's face and chest.

         As the cleaning finished, it was obvious Diana was having trouble keeping her little eyes open. "I think someone's tired. You've had a busy day, haven't you?"

         Diana barely responded when Zatanna scooped her up and took her to the bedroom, where she lowered the almost sleeping Diana into a crib at the foot of her bed. The baby Amazon murmured some non-words as Zatanna tucked a blanket around her. And then, just before she slipped away to slumber, Diana said, "Uv oo, Ta-Na."

         Zatanna couldn't keep a grin from splitting her face. She brushed the tot's forehead with a light finger and whispered, "I love you too, Diana. Sleep sweet."
131221211121111212221122.title: Zatanna Bottle Feeds Diana

1312212111211112122211221.content:
(Originally done by Rdolan1272)

         An inhuman wail tore Zatanna from her sleep the next morning, and the magician discovered two important things. First, to be such a small, angelic looking baby, Diana could generate some loud, unnerving cries. Second, Diana wasn't the only one in need of changing.

         Even though it made her feel guilty, Zatanna rolled out the changing mat and took care of herself first. Her magics weren't fully restored, but they were close enough. This time, instead of a single diaper, Zatanna produced an entire package. Laying down, she untaped her soggy diaper and lifted her bum. She gave herself a thorough cleaning before sliding a new diaper underneath her. With plenty of powder and only slightly less trouble than yesterday, she taped her diaper into place. Then, just to be safe and in no way to get the feel or comfort of extra padding, she added a second and third diaper.

         The bulk of the three diapers spread Zatanna's legs wide, forcing her to waddle to Diana's crib like a baby. She eased her little friend up onto her shoulder and gently patted Diana's bottom. "Shhhh. Let's get you out of those nasty, wet diapers. And into something nice and clean."

         She lay Diana down where she'd just changed herself. Diana sucked her thumb and bounced her legs as Zatanna hummed a little tune and cleaned her off. She kept bouncing her legs while Zatanna tried to get her new diaper on.

         "Okay, you little wiggle worm, stop bouncing and let me put your diaper on."

         Giggling as if it were a game, Diana increased the leg bouncing and slapped the floor with the hand not in her mouth.

         "That how it is, huh?" Zatanna asked, narrowing her eyes playfully. "Okay then. Just remember, you asked for it."

         She drew in a deep breath and blew a big, noisy raspberry on Diana's stomach. Diana convulsed with laughter, patting Zatanna on the head with her hands. Zatanna blew another one and Diana's whole body shook with laughter. Zatanna took the opportunity to gently grab Diana's ankles and left her bum up. "Oh-ho-ho! I got you!" She slid the diaper in place and strapped the princess in. "Someone's in her diaper, someone's in her diaper," Zatanna sang.

         Unlike her fussy 18-month-old self, 9-month-old Diana found this hysterical. She giggled and clapped and sputtered excited sounds that were probably meant to be words. And then she caught sight of Zatanna's attire. Seeing her big friend in a diaper filled her with wonder. She thought diapers were just for babies. She half flopped, half crawled until she had turned just right, and then she reached out a hand and patted Zatanna's diaper. "Ta-Na di-di! Ta-Na di-di!"

         "Yes," Zatanna laughed. "Ta-Na definitely di-di."

         With some effort, using Zatanna for support, Diana worked herself to standing. Once there, she leaned forward and blew what was meant to be a raspberry on Zatanna's shirt. Then she took a shaky step back and watched for a reaction.

         "I swear, I can't be a grown up for five minutes." She looked down at her huge, fluffy triple diaper and shrugged. "Then again, how grown up can I be, right?"

         Diana just watched her in expectant impatience.

         "Yeah, yeah," Zatanna said, sticking her tongue out. "Keep your diaper on."

         And then she had a thought. "Stay right there," she said, sliding herself away from Diana, whose impatience was clearly growing. "knirhS em ot s'anaiD ezis."

         One flash of light and ungrowing later, and Zatanna found herself the same height at Diana, with the added perk of still having her adult body.

         Diana seemed to think this was worth her wait. She stepped forward again and repeated the raspberry procedure from earlier. This time Zatanna reacted. She dropped on her back, stuck her legs in the air and licked them. Which was exactly what Diana wanted. She stumbled forward and blew again on Zatanna's shirt. Zatanna giggled and squirmed in as baby-like a manner as she could.

         Overjoyed, Diana flopped down beside her friend, mimicking her flailing and giggles. For several minutes the two lay there—the little, diapered baby and the little, diapered adult—squirming and laughing. Then Diana sat up and said, "Uh ga ba goo ta, Ta-Na."

         Zatanna remained on her back and responded, "Ew ba gah gah gah."

         "Ah ga ba di-di."

         "You Di-Di in di-di," said Zatanna.

         At that Diana burbled and clapped her diaper. "Di-Di di-di!"

         "Yep."

         "Ta-Na di-di!"

         Then, as if that meant something important, Diana leaned down to her hands and knees and paddled off to the bedroom door. Reaching the door, she turned and looked back at Zatanna, who rolled over to her hands and knees and crawled after her. It wasn't as if she had much choice in crawling. At her current size her three diapers were too big to let her walk.

         Diana led a merry chase. Down the short hallway. Into the living room. Around the coffee table. Into the kitchen. And finally back to the blanket Zatanna had put down yesterday before Diana's latest regression.

         Zatanna followed dutifully behind her, wondering what she must look like—a barely two-foot-tall woman in a diaper crawling around like a baby. When she reached the blanket, she decided she was having too much fun to care, so she sold out to the role. She plopped down on the blanket in as uncoordinated a manner as she could, shoved her thumb in her mouth and burbled, "Uhhhh goo ba goo goo."

         Diana handed her the stuffed dog from earlier and claimed the bear once again for herself. Zatanna cuddled the dog to her chest and flopped down on her back with an airy, "Ga ga ga gaaaaa."

         Diana took nearly the same position beside her and repeated her 'ga' for 'ga'.

         This time the dog and bear got along wonderfully. They bounced and danced and even kissed a few times, each time leading to a fit of giggles from both the baby and the babyish.

         "Ta-Na?" Diana eventually said, her tiny voice much too sweet to be safe.

         "Wha Di-Di?"

         Diana pounced, well, as much as a 9-month-old can pounce, on Zatanna, attacking her with wiggling fingers. "Ickle, ickle, ickle," she declared by way of war cry.

         Though not particularly ticklish, Zatanna laughed and twitched under Diana's tickling touch. Then she found a break and launched a counterattack. Her first assault was Diana's toes, which put the small Amazon into a fit. Then Zatanna moved to Diana's belly. And so the two kept up, back and forth, too busy laughing to care about anything else.

         Eventually, because these things have to happen, someone wet her diaper. Zatanna was shocked to discover she'd gone first. Just like before it was warm and strangely comforting, but this time Zatanna played her 'proper part'. She pitched back to the floor, rubbing her eyes with the backs of her hands, and screamed out, "Whaaaaa! Whaaaaaaaa! Uh-whaaaa! Uh-whaa-uh-whaaa-uh-whaaaaaaaaaa!"

         Worried for her friend, Diana crawled over and gave the bawling Zatanna a hug. "Ta-Na?"

         Zatanna halted her wails and looked up at Diana with her quivering bottom lip poking out. "Me wet-wet."

         Diana kissed her on the cheek and hugged her tighter. "Ta-Na 'kay." And then she realized something. Her own diaper felt weird. Cold and soppy. She rolled away from Zatanna onto her own back and began throwing her own fit. Zatanna blinked at her. And then she went back to her fit, both of them lying there kicking and bawling in unison.

         Zatanna didn't keep her tantrum up long. She knew Diana needed to be changed, and she wasn't going to risk her friend getting a rash over some cheap fun. She scootched to her knees and crawled over to Diana. "Diana, it's okay. I'm going to change you."

         Diana kept up the fit for a while, but Zatanna finally got her shushed enough to start to work. She tried to get her fingers under one of the tapes of Diana's diaper, but it was too well pressed. She fought and scrambled but couldn't make any progress. She was just too small, not strong enough. So as much as she hated to, she crawled off a few feet and said, "yM ydob kcab ot lamron."

         Once she was big again, she easily removed Diana's diaper, cleaned her and put her in a new one. When the change was finished, Zatanna sat back and rubbed the little princess's little belly, "Well, Diana, what do you think? This an okay vacation? Or are you ready to come back?"

         Lying on her back, Diana held her arms up and said, "Ma ma."

         Trying to bite back the smile that threatened to swallow her face, Zatanna reached down and kissed Diana on the forehead. "Well, I guess it probably wouldn't hurt to give you a few more days off, huh?"

         Diana cooed and clapped in agreement.

         Diana took nearly the same position beside her and repeated her 'ga' for 'ga'.

         This time the dog and bear got along wonderfully. They bounced and danced and even kissed a few times, each time leading to a fit of giggles from both the baby and the babyish.

         "Ta-Na?" Diana eventually said, her tiny voice much too sweet to be safe.

         "Wha Di-Di?"

         Diana pounced, well, as much as a 9-month-old can pounce, on Zatanna, attacking her with wiggling fingers. "Ickle, ickle, ickle," she declared by way of war cry.

         Though not particularly ticklish, Zatanna laughed and twitched under Diana's tickling touch. Then she found a break and launched a counterattack. Her first assault was Diana's toes, which put the small Amazon into a fit. Then Zatanna moved to Diana's belly. And so the two kept up, back and forth, too busy laughing to care about anything else.

         Eventually, because these things have to happen, someone wet her diaper. Zatanna was shocked to discover she'd gone first. Just like before it was warm and strangely comforting, but this time Zatanna played her 'proper part'. She pitched back to the floor, rubbing her eyes with the backs of her hands, and screamed out, "Whaaaaa! Whaaaaaaaa! Uh-whaaaa! Uh-whaa-uh-whaaa-uh-whaaaaaaaaaa!"

         Worried for her friend, Diana crawled over and gave the bawling Zatanna a hug. "Ta-Na?"

         Zatanna halted her wails and looked up at Diana with her quivering bottom lip poking out. "Me wet-wet."

         Diana kissed her on the cheek and hugged her tighter. "Ta-Na 'kay." And then she realized something. Her own diaper felt weird. Cold and soppy. She rolled away from Zatanna onto her own back and began throwing her own fit. Zatanna blinked at her. And then she went back to her fit, both of them lying there kicking and bawling in unison.

         Zatanna didn't keep her tantrum up long. She knew Diana needed to be changed, and she wasn't going to risk her friend getting a rash over some cheap fun. She scootched to her knees and crawled over to Diana. "Diana, it's okay. I'm going to change you."

         Diana kept up the fit for a while, but Zatanna finally got her shushed enough to start to work. She tried to get her fingers under one of the tapes of Diana's diaper, but it was too well pressed. She fought and scrambled but couldn't make any progress. She was just too small, not strong enough. So as much as she hated to, she crawled off a few feet and said, "yM ydob kcab ot lamron."

         Once she was big again, she easily removed Diana's diaper, cleaned her and put her in a new one. When the change was finished, Zatanna sat back and rubbed the little princess's little belly, "Well, Diana, what do you think? This an okay vacation? Or are you ready to come back?"

         Lying on her back, Diana held her arms up and said, "Ma ma."

         Trying to bite back the smile that threatened to swallow her face, Zatanna reached down and kissed Diana on the forehead. "Well, I guess it probably wouldn't hurt to give you a few more days off, huh?"

         Diana cooed and clapped in agreement.

Diana's world kept getting bigger and bigger. She was racing back through the ages. Before she knew it, she was 21 again. She remembered her first legal alcohol consumption, and going to a bar with her girlfriends.

Then she was 18 again. She remembered her graduation. She was a little less muscular then. At 17 she remembered losing her virginity. at 16, she remembered getting her drivers license. She also remembered her sweet sixteen.

Then she reached thirteen years old. Her body was much different now. She was a late bloomer in developing. She was flat as a board, and straight as a stick.

She soon was two years old. Her clothes soon changed. Her bra vanished, and her panties became a disposable diaper. Her pants became little girl jeans. Her shoes became velcro My Little Pony shoes. Her shirt was now a pink onesie that said "Mommy's Angel."

Her hair was now in pig tails. She had a pink pacifier in her mouth.

That was when...

1552.content:
Diana blinks as her vision blurs and a sense of Vertigo washes over her. She shuts her eyes tight and shakes her head, blinking a few times before opening them. When she does, her world is dark and wet. She's floating in a large body of water, and yet she doesn't feel the need to breath. reaching out, she feels a long, ropy chord protruding from her naval.

"WHAT DID YOU DO ZATANA!?" She shrieks mentally.

"Shhh, it's alright, calm down. You were worried about people finding you, well no one would think to look for you in my womb! Not with out buying me dinner first." she chuckles, earning an annoyed grunt from Diana. "And to be honest...this'll be a vacation for me as well. I always wanted to be pregnant, but empathy tummies are dull and I'm busy with the Justice League Dark so..."

"Sigh It's fine I guess, not like I can do much though." Diana grumbles.

"Oh no? Shut your eyes." Zatana instructs.

Diana does so and gasps as she suddenly is seeing through Zatana's eyes "Oh! This is much better. Weird, I can still feel myself floating."

"Part of the psychic link that lets us talk. Anyway, now that we're officially on vacation, I had some ideas for our first day together."
1552.title: Vacationing for two!

15522.content:
Later, a rotund Zatana arrives at the Gotham City Mall. People were bustling about, surprisingly unimpressed by the pregnant superheroine.

"Huh, I thought you showing up pregnant at a mall would draw more attention." Diana notes.

"I cast a glimmer before we left. To the world at large, I'm just a blonde pregnant lady looking to shop." Zatana giggles, hand gliding over her belly.

"I see. So, what are we doing here?" Diana asks.

Zatana smiles "Well, there's a new maternity wear store that we could stop at. Or if you're hungry, we could have lunch at the food court. Nice thing about a mall is there's plenty to do."
